testcase.classname: User can register to the website so that he could use the website's features
testcase.name: User can register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the registration page......................................passed When User enters "Test" in the name field...................................passed And User enters "TestTG2@test2.com" in the email field......................passed And User enters "Test123456789" in the password field.......................passed And User enters "565105599" in the mobile field.............................passed And User clicks on register button..........................................passed Then User should be redirected to the OTP page..............................passed
